subject: Re: [junit] Configurable XML file in JUNIT to set different sets of values to a test method
msgSnippet: ... Here, try this: http://twasink.net/blog/archives/2003/10/junit_and_datad.html You can easily modify the suite() method shown here to read the expected
messageBody:
imthiyas_y wrote:
> Hi
>
> I'm looking for a configurable XML file in JUNIT to set different sets
> of values to a test method . So that the values can be configurable by
> a layman. So pl help me on this.
>
Here, try this:

http://twasink.net/blog/archives/2003/10/junit_and_datad.html

You can easily modify the suite() method shown here to read the expected
inputs and results from a file.

Also, you may want to consider other tools; FIT seems to be gaining
popularity for this.
